data: David Chen works as Chief Strategy Officer at GlobalCorp in the manufacturing industry.
David Chen has over 20 years of experience in corporate strategy and operations leadership.
David Chen is located in Chicago, Illinois, United States.
David Chen has expertise in mergers and acquisitions, strategic planning, and organizational restructuring.
David Chen led three successful acquisitions totaling $2 billion in enterprise value.
David Chen implemented cost-saving initiatives that reduced overhead by 15%.
David Chen received a report from the analytics team for the Market Analysis for Q1 project on February 15, 2024.
David Chen identified three potential companies for the M&A Targets project on March 10, 2024.
